essential_properties.name: fromEmailAddress
essential_properties.description: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from

essential_properties.name: templateSubject
essential_properties.description: The subject line of the custom verification email

essential_properties.name: successRedirectionURL
essential_properties.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified

essential_properties.name: failureRedirectionURL
essential_properties.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified

essential_properties.name: templateName
essential_properties.description: The name of the custom verification email template to use when sending the verification email

common_operations.name: Create
common_operations.description: Create a new custom verification email template

common_operations.name: Delete
common_operations.description: Delete an existing custom verification email template

common_operations.name: Get
common_operations.description: Get the custom email verification template

common_operations.name: Get Many
common_operations.description: Get many of the existing custom verification email templates for your account

common_operations.name: Send
common_operations.description: Add an email address to the list of identities
